title: Chapter 2069 - 2069 I Want To Give You Another Surprise! (3)
body:
Chapter 2069 - 2069 I Want To Give You Another Surprise! (3)

2069 I Want to Give You Another Surprise! (3)

However, after he thought about it…

How could a person who could set up such a big game like the Abyss Island not know what was on his mind at the moment?

Even so, Water Ghost still dared to talk nonsense and stall for time with Yan Wuse. How could he not have any cards?

Xu Xiaoshou lowered his head.

He began to think about the deeper meaning of Water Ghost’s move from the point of view of a chess player, as well as what the color and number of his trump card was.

“Heh.”

When he saw how Xu Xiaoshou lowered his head in silence, Water Ghost finally vented a wave of frustration from being beaten up by a certain someone.

He turned around and looked at Yan Wuse.

“I didn’t do much in the Fallen Abyss. I only sent Situ Yongren to his death according to your requirement and gave you a secondary plane door.”

“Of course, there’s also Rao Yaoyao… She almost took the secondary plane door, that would have been a problem if she had done that .”

“Oh, right.”

At this point, Water Ghost seemed to have thought of something and took out a Mystery Box from his pocket. “Xu Xiaoshou, did Dao Qiongcang really teach you your Divine Secret?”

F*ck!

Xu Xiaoshou’s heart skipped a beat.

How dare a puny higher void like you call out the Saint’s name?

However, if Dao Qiongcang was on Abyss Island, he would have come out by now.

If he wasn’t there, then even if he called out his Saint name, it would seem that the people from the Shengshen Continent did not have much influence on Abyss Island?

Xu Xiaoshou was relieved. He nodded in front of Yan Wuse and everyone else on Abyss Island.

“Although I’m not talented, I do keep my word.”

“In Plan Zero, Hallmaster Dao did not teach me the Divine Secret; rather it was passed down to me from generation to generation.”

He even embellished some details about the non-existent Plan Zero.

Under the torrential rain, the people on Abyss Island started their discussion again.

“Plan Zero, so what exactly was that?”

“Hallmaster Dao really taught the Divine Secret? He did not memorize… Uh, about that?”

“Impossible! You can’t believe that anything good would come out of his mouth. He’s definitely lying. You actually dare to believe it?”

“Little brother, listen to my advice. Sometimes, the truth is often hidden in absurd matters.”

Naturally, Water Ghost heard the discussion among the Spiritual Cultivators on the island.

He admired Xu Xiaoshou’s quick thinking agility in the Saint War and how he took advantage of this situation and defamed Dao Qiongcang.

Although there was a high chance that this bit of defamation would not be able to tarnish Dao Qiongcang’s reputation, it was enough to disgust people.

Moreover, Xu Xiaoshou was good at surprises.

Perhaps in the end, this ‘disgust’ could be used to punish Dao Qiongcang?

It did not matter where he had casually placed a piece.

As long as it worked wonders, give it undue praise.

After he emphasized this, a black hand made of water emerged from Water Ghost’s palm and grabbed the Mystery Boxes that sank into his body.

At the same time, an ink-black hand pierced through Xu Xiaoshou’s chest. He opened his palm and a Mystery Box appeared.

“+(Controlled, Passive Points,+)+1.”

“+(Startled, Passive Points,+)+1.”

This Transformation really scared Xu Xiaoshou.

The Information Bar clearly showed that he was in control, but he did not feel any discomfort at all.

It was as if the ink-black hand that emerged from his chest was natural and innate!

He looked up.

After this move, the Power Upanishad Formation under Water Ghost’s feet did not even light up.

“Was this the absolute difference between the father and a son?”

Xu Xiaoshou picked up the Mystery Box in a daze. He had already understood what Water Ghost’s thoughts were.

“Can you change the authorization? I need to use it.” Water Ghost said.

Xu Xiaoshou suppressed the turmoil in his heart. He placed his hands behind his back and puffed out his chest proudly, as if he had expected this.

Weng!

The space moved, and a Mystery Box appeared in front of Water Ghost.

Seated on the dragon’s head, Xu Xiaoshou raised his chin slightly and waved his sleeve. “Take it. Use it as you like. If it’s not enough, there are more.”

On Abyss Island, an uproar erupted.

“+(Suspected, Passive Points+)+894.”

“+(Acknowledged, Passive Points+) +323.”

“+( In Awe, Passive Points+) +669.”

After Water Ghost recovered from his shock, he burst out in laughter.

It was really so enjoyable when one worked with a smart person!

Without hesitation, he dripped a drop of blood into the Mystery Box, then closed his eyes to sense something. Finally, the corners of his mouth curved into a smile.

“Very good, Yan Wuse. I’m going to give you another surprise…”

The smile on the golden beast mask not only made Yan Wuse’s heart palpitate, but it also made Xu Xiaoshou feel uneasy. All the Spiritual Cultivators on Abyss Island felt a chill run down their spines.

There were no questions asked.

On the Fallen Abyss, a miserable cry came from the crevice made by the red-hot Dark Iron Sword.

“Uhh!”

“What, what is this?”
